metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3153 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: SPIP 2.x before 2.1.19, 3.0.x before 3.0.22, and 3.1.x before 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code by adding content, related to the filtrer_entites function.

criterions.comment: spip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-1').
